name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience in software development, emphasizing expertise in **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **Postgres**, and **Docker**. Proficient in designing and implementing scalable backend systems in cloud environments utilizing **gcloud** and container orchestration with **Kubernetes**. My programming skills are complemented by a solid understanding of **MongoDB**, **Cassandra**, and experience in **Ruby on Rails** and **Astra-DB** as part of my tech stack.

I excel in implementing Test Driven Development (TDD) principles to ensure high-quality code and foster a culture of code peer-reviews, enhancing team collaboration, ownership, and accountability. My background in mathematics and data-driven decision making allows me to apply statistical practices effectively, contributing to the development of financial products and stock market solutions. With strong communication skills, I thrive in dynamic teams, driving innovative solutions and ensuring alignment with project goals.
